item.title: Gurt - Radio Awesome
item.description: It"s back! The usual show is happening. I can"t think of a spiel right now as I"ve not slept or ate in 24 hours. Rest assured, it will happen, or I"ll eat myself!

item.title: Gohanks - Retro For Sure
item.description: So apparently there"s a new DJ in town. Will he pull off a great show? Or will you run away scared for your lives (all 3 of them)? What will this be all about? Find out and listen to the premmiere live show - Retro For Sure with your host Gohanks!
